thread.title: BRIEF-Seaspan Shipyards Awarded Contract For New Zealand's Frigate System Upgrade Project

title: BRIEF-Seaspan Shipyards Awarded Contract For New Zealand's Frigate System Upgrade Project

organizations.name: frigate system upgrade project reuters staff
lockheed martin canada on royal new zealand navy

text: March 8, 2018 / 6:07 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Seaspan Shipyards Awarded Contract For New Zealand's Frigate System Upgrade Project Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 8 (Reuters) - Seaspan Shipyards: * SEASPAN SHIPYARDS’ CANADIAN EXPERTISE TO BE SHARED INTERNATIONALLY WITH AWARDING OF LOCKHEED MARTIN CANADA CONTRACT FOR NEW ZEALAND’S FRIGATE SYSTEM UPGRADE PROJECT * SEASPAN SHIPYARDS - IS AWARDED FRIGATE SYSTEMS UPGRADE PROJECT AS SUBCONTRACTOR FOR LOCKHEED MARTIN CANADA ON ROYAL NEW ZEALAND NAVY’S ANZAC FRIGATES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
